text:
Water level in

Mettur Dam

Mettur: The water level in Mettur Dam stood at 64 feet on Sunday against its full level of 120 feet. The storage level stood at 28.472 tmc. The inflow into the dam was 139 cusecs and the discharge into River Cauvery is 5,000 cusecs, PWD sources said.

Cotton auctioned

Cotton stock was auctioned for Rs. 3.30 crore at the weekly auction held at the Konganapuram branch of the Tiruchengode Agricultural Producers Cooperative Marketing Society premises on Saturday.

While the Bt cotton variety fetched a price ranging between Rs. 4,700 and Rs. 5,282 per bag; the DCH variety fetched a price between Rs. 5,600 and Rs. 6,350 per bag.
title: TAMIL NADU
